# Welcome {.unnumbered}

This is an opinionated guide for discovering a carefully selected collection
of exquisite open source fonts that are perfect for your software projects
and websites.
This unique lookbook showcases a variety of typefaces - from serif and
sans serif to display and small caps - that are not only visually
stunning but also robust in design.
We have curated a range of fonts that, while being available under open
licenses, have not yet been overused, ensuring your projects maintain a fresh
and distinctive appearance.
